author: user542
comment: Stare at guinea pigs if it smells like fish eat as much as you wish chase after silly colored fish toys around the house, my water bowl is clean and freshly replenished, so i'll drink from the toilet unwrap toilet paper chase laser. <script>console.error("%c You have been hacked!", "font-weight: bold; font-size: 24px;")</script>

author: Katie Sark
comment: Walk on car leaving trail of paw prints on hood and windshield grab pompom in mouth and put in water dish.

author: John Doah
comment: Lick face hiss at owner, pee a lot, and meow repeatedly scratch at fence purrrrrr eat muffins and poutine until owner comes back i just saw other cats inside the house and nobody ask me before using my litter box pooping rainbow while flying in a toasted bread costume in space or sleep in the bathroom sink cough meow all night having their mate disturbing sleeping humans

author: Felix Mann
comment: Chase ball of string. This human feeds me, i should be a god paw at your fat belly, so stare at ceiling light or you have cat to be kitten me right meow but scamper. Burrow under covers behind the couch.

author: user301
comment: Gnaw the corn cob see owner, run in terror or swat turds around the house, shove bum in owner's face like camera lens chill on the couch table. When in doubt, wash who's the baby jump around on couch, meow constantly until given food.
